title: Rock Gnome
content:
s:

Darkvision: Can see in the dark up to 12 m. Artificer's Lore: Add twice your proficiency bonus to History checks. (this also gives you proficiency in History for free)

Base Racial Speed Gnome Cunning: You have advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma Saving Throws.

Rock Gnome Tips & Notes

During Early Access, the Rock Gnome race used to feature +2 Intelligence and +1 Constitution. This has been changed in the full launch of BG3 and the Ability Score points are now associated with t
